description: Erection of a part two, part single storey rear extension and installation of a front roof light to the house, matching replacement of the house's existing front and first floor rear windows, replacement of the house's existing first floor side window with two first floor side windows and one ground floor side window and door with two ground floor side windows and conversion of its existing single storey side garage to habitable space.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:  LaVaastu/2024/373/05/Rev B  Received:  10 April 2024;  LaVaastu/2023/373/06/Rev A  Received:  05 April 2024;  LaVaastu/2024/374/01; LaVaastu/2024/374/02; LaVaastu/2024/374/03; LaVaastu/2024/374/04; Unreferenced Location Plan  Received:  02 February 2024.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the part two, part single storey rear extension and converted single storey side garage extension hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - The dwelling house, as enlarged and altered in accordance with this permission, shall only be used as a single unit of accommodation, and shall not be subdivided, separated or altered in any way so as to create two or more separate units of accommodation, without further grant of planning permission.

Condition : 6 - The two replacement first floor side windows and one replacement ground floor side window hereby approved shall be obscure glazed, not openable below 1.75 metres above finished floor level and be permanently retained as such.
